prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts and feelings when I had to leave the Oktoberfest early on September the 21st of 2024?

Stefan should be represented by the 11th house (group host) and Me by the Ascendant.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic listing of the relevant data from the provided horary chart—using horary principles only—to address your query regarding Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings as represented by the 11th house (group host) while you are represented by the Ascendant:

1. Planetary Positions (Degrees, Signs, and House Placements)
 • Sun: 15°33′ Aquarius – Located in the 5th house (ruling Stefan via the 11th house, since Leo’s ruler is the Sun)
 • Moon: 29°47′ Aries – Located in the 7th house (with Moon’s own qualities influencing emotional responses)
 • Mercury: 11°39′ Aquarius – In the 5th house alongside the Sun, contributing to mental perceptions
 • Venus: 29°51′ Pisces – In the 6th house, linked with feelings and relationships
 • Mars: 19°35′ Cancer (retrograde) – In the 10th house, indicating action and drive
 • Jupiter: 11°16′ Gemini (retrograde) – In the 9th house, concerns expansion and perspective
 • Saturn: 17°46′ Pisces – In the 6th house, representing structure and limits in emotional expression
 • Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus – In the 8th house, suggesting sudden or unexpected influences
 • Neptune: 28°03′ Pisces – In the 6th house, reinforcing Venusian themes and intuition
 • Pluto: 2°09′ Aquarius – In the 4th house, brings transformative undercurrents
 • North Node: 29°41′ Pisces (retrograde) – In the 6th house, linked to fate and karmic lessons
 • Chiron: 19°35′ Aries – In the 7th house, affecting wounds and healing in relationship dynamics
 • Ascendant: 7° Libra – Your direct point of identity and approach to the question
 • Midheaven (MC): 8° Cancer – In a configuration influencing career/public life
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 8° Capricorn – Setting the foundational base of the chart

2. House Considerations
 • Ascendant (7° Libra): Represents Melissa’s personal position in the query
 • 11th House: Represents Stefan and the “group host” dimension. The 11th house cusp is at 14° Leo. Since Leo is ruled by the Sun, Sun’s condition becomes pivotal for Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings.

3. Key Aspects (with orb values provided; only those that are directly relevant are emphasized for clarity)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 4°): Indicates a healing or insightful quality to the mental/emotional expression
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 4°): Merges communication with identity—important for transmitting thoughts
 • Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 4°) & Sun Trine Ascendant (orb: 8°): These aspects relate the Sun (and so Stefan’s representation) harmoniously with factors influencing perception and projection
 • Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 0°) and Mercury Trine Ascendant (orb: 4°): Support clear, positive communication
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 1°) and Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 0°): Tie relationships and fate together, influencing emotional understatements
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 3°): Points to transformative impulses in matters of the heart
 • Moon Square Pluto (orb: 3°): Signals deep, perhaps intense emotional undercurrents
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 0°): Links action (Mars) with wounding (Chiron), indicating possible defensive or protective feelings
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°) and Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°): Suggest controlled yet unexpected actions
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°): A transformative influence connected with karmic destiny
 • Ascendant Square IC (orb: 1°) and Ascendant Square MC (orb: 1°): Indicate tension between personal identity and foundational circumstances/public expectations
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°): Points to tension between expansion and restriction in the broader context

4. Patterns and Special Features
 • Grand Trine Pattern: Involving Sun in Aquarius, Mercury in Aquarius, Jupiter in Gemini, and the Ascendant in Libra. This pattern provides an overall harmonious, communicative, and insightful quality bridging your identity (Ascendant) and the Sun’s role (as Stefan’s representative).
 • T-Square Pattern: Formed by the MC in Cancer, the Ascendant in Libra, and the IC in Capricorn, which adds dynamic tension between personal needs and public/foundational factors.
 • Special Features:
  – The Moon is a Waxing Crescent, highlighting emerging feelings.
  – Its “Bowl shape” and the emphasis of Air among the inner planets suggest an environment where communication, rational cues, and group discussions are key.
  – The dominance of cardinal modes and the absence of inner planets in Earth signs give weight to active, initiating energies and fluid interpretations.

5. Ruler Considerations
 • Since Stefan is represented by the 11th house, the condition of its ruler (the Sun in Leo’s domain) is critical. The Sun’s position in the 5th house, its aspects (especially its conjunction with Mercury and trines with Jupiter and the Ascendant), are all factors that will color Stefan’s inner state.
 • Your Ascendant (Libra 7°) and its aspects—both friendly (Jupiter, Mercury, Sun trines) and challenging (square to IC and MC, opposition from Venus)—provide a context for your concerns relative to Stefan’s feelings.

6. Additional Horary Details
 • The placement of inner planets primarily in the bottom right quadrant indicates that the events strongly impact public/outer circumstances.
 • The absence of planets in the bottom left quadrant suggests that issues related to the subconscious or internal private matters might be less prominent in this query.
 • Noting that Mars and the Moon’s placement (in Aries and Cancer) are in mutual reception via their dignities emphasizes an interplay between impulsive energy and emotional insight.

This complete list is intended as the raw chart data for further step-by-step interpretations using established horary principles. Please confirm receipt of these foundational details before proceeding to the interpretive phase.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Drawing upon the horary chart using traditional methodologies, here is the interpretation regarding Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings when you departed the Oktoberfest early on September 21, 2024:

1. In this chart the 11th house represents Stefan, and its ruling planet is the Sun. The Sun sits at 15°33′ Aquarius in the 5th house, a placement that colors his response with a creative, somewhat detached outlook. His mind—captured by Mercury’s conjunction in Aquarius (also in the 5th house)—evaluates the situation more from an intellectual and communal perspective rather than purely emotional.

2. The harmonious Sun aspects (trines to both Jupiter and the Ascendant) indicate that while Stefan’s initial thoughts processed the event with generosity and clarity, there remains an undercurrent of stability that guarantees his logic in social settings remains intact. His overall reaction appears measured and communicative.

3. Emotionally, however, the Moon in Aries, placed in the 7th house, along with its square aspect to Pluto, points to an intense, if hidden, emotional reaction at a transformational or even unsettling level. Stefan may have experienced a sudden surge of raw feeling—a mix of vulnerability and internal conflict—behind his outwardly composed facade.

4. The tension suggested by Mars in Cancer (retrograde) in the 10th house, particularly its square with Chiron in Aries, indicates that his feelings were not without woundings. There is a sense of protective anger or remorse intertwined with the event. The Mars-Chiron aspect can relate to emotional pain triggered by an action that felt abrupt or inadvertently dismissive.

5. The heavy presence of Pisces in the 6th house (with Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and the North Node) adds a layer of confusion and subtlety to his emotional state. These placements combine to create a milieu where compassion, idealism, and a hint of fatalism mix with the practicalities of his everyday life. Stefan’s inner world might have been troubled by a deeper, perhaps self-reproachful sensitivity about how the evening unfolded, even if he later framed it in more rational terms.

6. A noticeable Grand Trine ties together the Sun in Aquarius, Mercury in Aquarius, Jupiter in Gemini, and your Ascendant in Libra, suggesting that communication and insight offer relief from internal strain. Stefan’s thoughts, while marked by an initial shock or discomfort, are ultimately tempered by a rational, group-oriented perspective. This indicates that he resolved the moment in favor of clarity and continued engagement with the social group rather than letting any raw emotions linger to create lasting discord.

7. Finally, the T-Square formed by the MC in Cancer, the Ascendant in Libra, and the IC in Capricorn indicates inherent tension in the foundations of the situation. This dynamic suggests that Stefan’s internal reaction was mixed—his instinctive feelings conflicted with his need to project stability and order in public life.

Overall, Stefan’s true thoughts and feelings in that instance appear as a layered reaction: a cool, measured evaluation intermingled with an undercurrent of intense, possibly wounded emotion. Outwardly, he maintained a communicative and composed posture; internally, however, he harbored a mix of rational detachment and a sensitive response to feeling unexpectedly abandoned or disrupted in an environment where he valued continuity.

The chart indicates no overt hostility—rather, a complex blend of intellectual appraisal and a private surge of deeper emotional responses that, while not easily shared, leave an indelible mark on his experience of the event.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Did he think my leaving was directly related to something he did?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes: The chart indicates that Stefan's initial thoughts did not settle on a clear, personal fault regarding your leaving. The position of the Sun—the indicator for his involvement in group matters—and its supportive aspects suggest that his analytical processing of the event was relatively detached. While his underlying emotional tensions show an internal conflict and hints of wounded pride (as seen in the Moon–Pluto square and Mars–Chiron square), there is no strong astrological marker that conclusively anchors his interpretation to direct blame on his actions. In essence, though he may have privately questioned circumstances and his role in the unfolding events, the overall configuration reveals a mind more engaged in rational assessment than assigning sole culpability to his behavior.
